task: Generate 50 New Jersey driving test questions
description: Create 50 NJ-specific driving knowledge test questions. Use web search to verify all facts against current NJ DMV manual. Include state-specific info like speed limits, parking distances, BAC limits, GDL restrictions. Save to questions/nj-questions.json

Create 150 universal questions that are true in ALL 50 US states. Topics: traffic signs/shapes, lane markings, defensive driving, emergency situations, vehicle operation. Avoid state-variable topics (speed limits, distances, BAC). Save to questions/universal-questions.json

task: Verify NJ questions against DMV manual
description: Web search to verify each NJ question answer against the current NJ Driver Manual. Fix any incorrect answers. Mark passes: true only when all 50 are verified.

task: Verify universal questions are truly universal
description: Check that no universal question has an answer that varies by state. Web search any questionable facts. Remove or fix any state-specific content.
